name: Klaus (itch) (Skou)
description:
Avoid the unavoidable!

Whenever you press the Spacebar, 

the wall you last touched is moved right behind you.

Tap at the right moment to avoid losing space.

If you run out of space, you die!

Get the full Version on Android with Leaderboards and 15 Achievements to unlock

iOS Version comming soon

Controls:

Space - Moves the wall right behind you

Screenshots:

Notes:

Klaus is the first game I ever made. 

It is simple and can be really frustrating.

I hope you enjoy it :)
